definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

sentences.english: What kinds of best practices and guidelines am I talking about?
sentences.chinese: 我所指的是什么类型的最佳实践和指导原则呢？

sentences.english: The refund hereby refers to the tuition, not including the registration fee.
sentences.chinese: 此处所指退费仅限学费，报名费恕不退还。

sentences.english: Here MFM means thermal Mass Flow Meter.
sentences.chinese: 本手册所指的为量热式质量流量计。

sentences.english: Jackson pointed to the mouth of the San Jacinto River.
sentences.chinese: 杰克逊总统所指的是圣加辛托河的河口。

sentences.english: Thus the city and its signifiers are fraught with multiple meanings.
sentences.chinese: 因此，城市及其所指便充满了多重的意义。

sentences.english: Tools in Frost are tricky. You have to learn how to use them.
sentences.chinese: 弗罗斯特所指的工具很狡猾，要去学会分析。

sentences.english: Other tasks assigned by Planning Mgr.
sentences.chinese: 完成计划经理所指派的其他工作。

sentences.english: Gets or sets a member of the script object that is designated by the specified name.
sentences.chinese: 取得或设定指定的名称所指派指令码物件的成员。

sentences.english: the signified-signifier relationship, as I said, is arbitrary.
sentences.chinese: 所指和能指的关系，就如我刚才说的，是任意的。

sentences.english: Note: All time limit refers to the continuous time span before the date of application.
sentences.chinese: 本条所指年限均指申请之日前连续的年限。

sentences.english: The arrow's place is the synthetic ammonia workshop I formerly worked.
sentences.chinese: 箭头所指的地方是我曾经工作过的合成氨车间。

sentences.english: We define true definition of House Edge as the ratio of the average loss to the initial bet.
sentences.chinese: 我们所指的赌场优势是平均赔率对下注额的比率。

sentences.english: He was talking about the cherimoya.
What is the latitude and longitude of the N-arrow in the Symphony Lake?
sentences.chinese: 在交响乐湖畔N箭头所指处的经度和纬度各是多少？

sentences.english: The operation of the mill will be described referring to a case where uranium ore is simultaneously pulverized and leached.
sentences.chinese: 经营磨坊将被称为所指情形铀矿石，同时煤粉和淋洗。

sentences.english: She wanted to know what I meant by truth.
sentences.chinese: 她想知道我所指的“真理”是什么意思。

definition: to point towards/aimed at/facing/the direction indicated
toward/to face/to open onto/to turn towards/orientation/exposure/Qibla (Islam)
